```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "steelblue"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "steelblue"))

wk_post <- tibble(
  

"Data Camp" = c(unchecked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked,
            checked),

"R" = c(checked,
        unchecked,
        unchecked,
        unchecked,
        unchecked,
        checked),

"Slack" = c(unchecked, 
              unchecked, 
              unchecked,
              checked,
              checked,
              unchecked),

Description = c("Install Course Software",
                "Read a few things",
                "Look over the website",
                "Get into the course Slack account",
                "Find a bad graphic",
                "Complete Introduction to R"),

Location = c("[Link](/assignment/01-assignment/#class-slack-account-access-1)",
             "[Link](/assignment/01-assignment/#verify-qualtrics-account-login-1)",
             "[Link](/readings/01-readings/#review-the-rest-1)",
             "[Link](/assignment/01-assignment/#class-slack-account-access-1",
             "[Link](/assignment/01-assignment/#find-a-bad-graphic-1)",
             "[Link](https://www.datacamp.com/")

)
```
